divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the Triple chair lift at maple ski ridge alone and I see a light crusing along at a normal plane speed in the distance to my left. Then it, without even stopping,changes course to down and back, diagonally, much faster (unlike a chopper.) when It is near the tree line it stopped and hovered, then gradually sank below the trees. Later on my next lift ride I saw It apparently rise up again and fly away.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around February 21st 2007
